title: 09/14/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/14/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Monday Night Football Analyst Louis Riddick about last night's game. Is Derek Carr the future at QB in Las Vegas? Ryan Kartje, USC Beat Writer for the LA Times, discusses why the Trojans did away with Head Coach Clay Helton. Ross Tucker calls in and explains how Lamar could become a better QB at this stage in his career. And former College Football Head
